body_html: @aselle Yeah, I think there's more to a general reimplementation of np.repeat() than what I posted in that answer (assuming I'm thinking of the same one as you...). If there were a neat way to do it in Python, I'd be all in favor of doing it that way, but none springs to mind.
body_text: @aselle Yeah, I think there's more to a general reimplementation of np.repeat() than what I posted in that answer (assuming I'm thinking of the same one as you...). If there were a neat way to do it in Python, I'd be all in favor of doing it that way, but none springs to mind.
body: @aselle Yeah, I think there's more to a general reimplementation of `np.repeat()` than what I posted in that answer (assuming I'm thinking of the same one as you...). If there were a neat way to do it in Python, I'd be all in favor of doing it that way, but none springs to mind.
